item.title: Neil add a quote by Larry Niven
item.description: "The dinosaurs became extinct because they didn't have a space program. And if we become extinct because we don't have a space program, it'll serve us right!" -- Larry Niven

item.title: Neil add a quote by David Gerrold
item.description: "The secret of the universe is this: The universe doesn't care. That part of the job is yours." -- David Gerrold

item.title: Neil add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "You have attributed conditions to villainy that simply result from stupidity." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Neil add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "Jazz isn't dead. It just smells funny." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Neil add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "Those who believe in telekinetics, raise my hand." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Neil add a quote by Gore Vidal
item.description: "Half of the American people have never read a newspaper. Half never voted for President. One hopes it is the same half." -- Gore Vidal

item.title: Neil add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description:
"All that is gold does not glitter, Not all those who wander are lost; The old that is strong does not wither, Deep roots are not reached by the frost.
From the ashes a fire shall be woken, A light from the shadows shall spring; Renewed shall be blade that was broken, The crownless again shall be king." -- J.R.R. Tolkien
